output:
  html_document: default

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(tidystats)

# Options
options(digits = 2)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '-')
```

### Setup

Start by reading in the data frame containing the output of all the statistical models.

```{r get_results, message = FALSE}
results <- read_stats("results.csv")
```

### Regression results

```{r}
results %>%
  stats_list_to_df() %>%
  filter(method == "Linear regression") %>%
  kable()
```

### Regression table examples

`r report_table_lm(results, "M3_1")`
